lines.text: Thank you very much. It's so easy for a woman to make a fool of herself; I'm surprised I haven't never done it before.
Thank you very much. It's so easy for a woman to make a fool of herself; I'm surprised I haven't done it before.
I want to make loud, rude noises. I want to spill things and push chairs over. After all, I'm a human being and I like to act like one occasionally.
Next time I go slumming I'll remember to stay out of the gutter.
I quit the newspaper business to manage a dancer - just when he stops dancing.
